Package pkgMain

Class ListScreen

java.lang.Object
pkgMain.Screen
pkgMain.ListScreen
Direct Known Subclasses:
AddPlantListScreen, LepListScreen, PlantListScreen
abstract class ListScreen
extends Screen
The ListScreen class is a screen that lists the something for the user.

rbila
